result: eg-transition(:enter='enter', :leave='leave') .eg-slide(v-if='active') .eg-slide-content h3 Secret Slide ! eg-transition(leave='fadeOutLeft', enter='fadeIn') .subslide(v-if='step <= 3') p. Congratulations ! By switching off the totality of this slideshow you unlocked the secret slide. p. Wanna know Eagle's secret ? It rocks at animating SVG! Below is a single SVG animated by inserting CSS and v-if directives. .center.included-svg include assets/animated.svg eg-transition(enter='slideInRight', leave='fadeOutRight') .subslide(v-if='step >3') p.center And if you like plots, you can use awesome libraries like Chart.js .figure p.caption(v-html='title') chart(:data='figureData(step)', :options='figureOptions', type='bar', :height='250')
